item.title: What I Liked About Ao Nang
item.description: We decided to visit Ao Nang as it wasnâ€™t too far from Krabi. The white songthaews go direct to Ao Nang (bus station is outside the KFC) and costed 100 baht for the both of us. It only took around 40 minutes to reach there. The white songthaew go to and from Krabi town to Ao Nang Ao Nang is a popular beach town in Krabi town and consists of a main road bustling with restaurants, bars, hotels and clothing stalls.
